description:
Online selling is one of the easiest ways to make money from home!


So... You're ready to take the plunge and begin selling online - but you don't know where to start?

  • Do you begin by selling on eBay, Amazon, Etsy, Craigslist?
  • What about setting up your own ecommerce website?
  • What about shopping carts and payment systems?

If you are brand new to the idea of selling online, this introductory course will give you those initial answers you are looking for.

I've been selling on these platforms for over 15 years and in this course, I will walk you through over a dozen of the top ecommerce websites and selling platforms and show you what's good and not so good about each of them!

You will clearly understand these top online selling venues and, when you complete this course, you will have a much clearer understanding of the best place for you to get started.

If you are already well-versed in the ecommerce world, then this isn't the class for you.

But if you want an excellent course that shows you, step-by-step, where the best places to sell online are, then this is the course for you!

Also included - a PDF of the entire presentation so you can click on the links and immediately go to the sites and resources.

Take this course and benefit from Udemy's 30-day money back guarantee - you'll be glad you did!
title: Ecommerce - Introduction To The Top 12 Ecommerce Platforms
